name: Cardopoly
description:
Cardopoly is a dice replacement card deck for the tradtional property buying board game and many of its themed editions.

Tap the deck to turn over a card on your turn when normally you would have rolled two dice and move your pawn on the board the amount shown. Red numbered cards indicate "Doubles" rolled, take another turn!

Turn on the Action Cards to speed up play with actions such as Free Build, Swap Places, Move Up To 5, Next Property and more.

The Random Deck option will randomly draw a card from the deck each time for extra random fun. Playing with this option turned off will draw cards from the top of the deck traditionally until reaching the last card upon which the deck will be reshuffled.

For more board game fun see our other board game app "Spooky Shuffle".
